title: Crisis of Faith
description: With the Archbishop gone, the Concordat has fractured. A militant zealot faction has seized the Grand Cathedral, taking the moderate priests hostage. You must break the siege.

turns.narrative: The Cathedral doors are barred. Zealot archers are firing from the bell towers.
turns.choice_a: Blow the main doors with high explosives
turns.consequence_a: The doors shatter, killing the archers in the blast radius, but damaging the historic stonework permanently.
turns.choice_b: Scale the walls and infiltrate the bell tower
turns.consequence_b: A dangerous climb under fire. You eliminate the archers silently and open the side doors for the Warden militia.

turns.narrative: Inside, the Zealot Commander has lined up the hostages before the altar.
turns.consequence_a: He accepts. A brutal fight before the terrified priests. You slay him, breaking the zealots' morale instantly.
turns.choice_b: Command your militia to fire a volley into the zealots
turns.consequence_b: A chaotic skirmish. The zealots are killed, but several priests die in the crossfire.

hostages_saved_duel.description: You saved the priests via honorable duel.

hostages_killed_volley.description: You broke the zealots, but priests died in the volley.

conclusion: You saved the priests via honorable duel.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
